item.title: Loyalty Titles [PI]
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

There is a tutorial on another website I shall find it. for you

THIS IS NOT MINE

Server Sided:

Go to Player.java and declare this:

now find playerProps.writeByte(combatLevel);

and replace

playerProps.writeWord(0); with:

Now save and exit and head to PlayerSave and add these in it (YOU SHOULD KNOW WHERE):

} else if (token.equals("loyalty-rank")) { p.loyaltyRank = Integer.parseInt(token2);

characterfile.write("loyalty-rank = ", 0, 15); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.loyaltyRank ), 0, Integer .toString(p.loyaltyRank).length()); characterfile.newLine();

Finished server sided

Now…

Client Sided:

Declare this in client.java

//thanks to Nouish for getting the titles and me for programming. public final String loyaltyRank(final int i) { switch (i) { case 1: return "Lord"; case 2: return "Lady"; case 3: return "Sir"; case 4: return "Dame"; case 5: return "Duderino"; case 6: return "Dudette"; case 7: return "Lionheart"; case 8: return "Crusader"; case 9: return "Hellraiser"; case 10: return "Desperado"; case 11: return "Baron"; case 12: return "Baroness"; case 13: return "Count"; case 14: return "Countess"; case 15: return "Overlord"; case 16: return "Overlordess"; case 17: return "Bandito"; case 18: return "Duke"; case 19: return "Duchess"; case 20: return "Big Cheese"; case 21: return "Bigwig"; case 22: return "King"; case 23: return "Queen"; case 24: return "Wunderkind"; default: return ""; } }

now in the same class find

and there should be

after the else and replace that with:

[code]s = “@or2@” + loyaltyRank(player.skill) + "@whi@ " + player.name

  • combatDiffColor(myPlayer.combatLevel, player.combatLevel)
  • " (level-" + player.combatLevel + “)”;[/code]

Read full topic
